name: claw-llm-router
description: OpenClaw plugin that cuts LLM costs 40-80% by routing prompts to the cheapest capable model. 15-dimension classifier, <1ms local routing, automatic fallback chain.
author: Donn Felker

scripts.test: npx tsx --test tests/providers/*.test.ts tests/classifier.test.ts tests/proxy.test.ts tests/tier-config.test.ts tests/router-logger.test.ts
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
